mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT USER_SEQ , USER_ID , NAME AS USERNAME , PWD AS PASSWORD , EMAIL , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , USER_REG_YN , GENDER , BIRTH_YMD , HEIGHT , WEIGHT , SIDO_CODE , SIGUNGU_CODE , POSITION_CODE , ROADADDRESS FROM USER WHERE USER_SEQ=#{id}

SELECT USER_ID , NAME AS USERNAME , PWD AS PASSWORD , EMAIL , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , USER_REG_YN , GENDER , HEIGHT , WEIGHT , SIDO_CODE , SIGUNGU_CODE , POSITION_CODE FROM USER WHERE NAME=#{userName} OR EMAIL=#{email}

SELECT USER_SEQ , USER_ID , NAME AS USERNAME , PWD AS PASSWORD , EMAIL , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , USER_REG_YN , GENDER , HEIGHT , WEIGHT , SIDO_CODE , SIGUNGU_CODE , POSITION_CODE FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PWD = #{password}
SELECT B.TEAM_SEQ , B.TEAM_AUTH_CODE FROM USER A INNER JOIN TEAM_MEMBER B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}
SELECT USER_ID , USER_SEQ FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
